item.description:
Hello, ladies!

Saturday afternoon drinks is back!

We first met during Labor Day weekend, and we had a blast! Let's continue the conversations and meet again!

Let's meet at 2:30 pm on Saturday, November 20 at Foundry on Elm at 255 Elm Street in Davis Square in Somerville. According to the hostess, the bar has a full liquor license.

I'd love to have sent this out as an actual event, but I can't seem to figure out how to do it. If you know how to create events, and would like to show me how, I would be forever grateful.

Until than, put this event on your calendar!

See you there,

Lindsay
item.name: Saturday Afternoon Drinks!
